name: MathQuiz
0:
”Alexa, Open Math Buddy.”
”Alexa, Talk to Math Buddy.”
”Alexa, Ask Math Buddy to Start a Game.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math buddy
des:
Put your math skills to the test by competing against the world. This skill tests your elementary mathematics skills, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and comparison. You get one point for every correct question. 
We always keep track of your progress so that you can come back and break your record.

Here are the things you can say once you initialize the skill.

Repeat/Say Again - To hear the question again.
Help - To get detailed instructions.
Start a New Game - To start a new game

Good luck!
